sense.def:
One's strength
je človekova telesna moč in sposobnost.

seg.quote: He pulled with all his strength.

sense.def:
Strength
je tudi pogum ali odločnost.

seg.quote: With unshakable strength of character she stayed on after the crisis.
This gave us the strength to resist further temptation.

sense.def:
Moč ali vpliv lahko imenujemo tudi
strength
.

seg.quote: ...the enormous strength and influence of the unions.

sense.def:
One's strengths
so človekove dobre lastnosti in sposobnosti.

seg.quote: Each firm has its particular strengths and weaknesses.

sense.def:
The strength of an object
je sposobnost nekega predmeta, da prenese grobo ravnanje ali veliko breme.

The strength of a feeling or opinion
je stopnja, do katere imajo ljudje določeno čustvo ali mnenje.

seg.quote: The Government had clearly underestimated the strength of popular feeling.

sense.def:
The strength of an opinion, argument, or story
je stopnja, do katere je mnenje, trditev ali zgodba verjetno resnična.

seg.quote: He continued to deny it, despite the growing strength of the argument.

sense.def:
The strength of a relationship
je stopnja tesnosti nekega razmerja ali odnosa.

seg.quote: This leads to bonds of deceptive strength being formed with the company.

sense.def:
The strength of a group of people
je celotno število oseb v skupini.

seg.quote: Their forces were growing in strength.

sense.def:
Kadar osebe ali organizacije
go from strength to strength
, postopoma postajajo uspešnejše.

To act on the strength of a fact or situation
pomeni, da je določeno dejstvo ali položaj podlaga ali razlog za naše dejanje.

seg.quote: The Cabinet agreed to a grant of £4m on the strength of the Company's projections of sales.
